newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Six cadets shot dead in Russian military college.
newsitem.headline: Six cadets shot dead in Russian military college.

text.p: Two students at a Russian military college shot dead six fellow cadets on Sunday and badly wounded two others before escaping, a local police officer said.
No motive was immediately known, he said by telephone from Volgograd southeast of Moscow.
The incident happened at 4.20 a.m. (0020 GMT) at Kamyshin Military College north of Volgograd.
The two injured students were taken to hospital. Police were looking for the two suspects.
